var AccessIN_func = function() {
    var ai_form;
    ai_form = document.querySelector("#form"); // Kentico page
    if (typeof ai_form !== "undefined" && ai_form !== null){
        console.log("ai_from: "+ JSON.stringify(ai_form));
    } else {
        ai_form = document.querySelector("#aspnetForm"); // iMIS page
        if (typeof ai_form !== "undefined" && ai_form !== null){
            console.log("ai_from: "+ JSON.stringify(ai_form));
        } else {
            console.log("Can't Find Object");
        }
    }   
    //var ai_form = document.querySelector("#form");
    if (ai_form) {
        var AccessIN_submit = function(e,path='https://accessin.org/app/accessin/index.php/welcome2/index_AccessIN',target='_blank',method='post') {
        ai_form.action = path;
        ai_form.target = target;
            e.preventDefault;
            var ai_url = document.querySelector("#AccessIN_url");
            ai_url.value = window.location.href;
            console.log("ai_url.value: "+ ai_url.value);
            var ai_dom = document.querySelector("#AccessIN_dom");
            ai_dom.value = document.querySelector("html").outerHTML;
            console.log("ai_dom.value: "+ ai_dom.value);
            var ai_screenWidth = document.querySelector("#AccessIN_screenWidth");
            ai_screenWidth.value = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientWidth, window.innerWidth || 0);
            console.log("ai_screenWidth.value: "+ ai_screenWidth.value);
            var ai_screenHeight = document.querySelector("#AccessIN_screenHeight");
            ai_screenHeight.value = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientHeight, window.innerHeight || 0);
            console.log("ai_screenHeight.value: "+ ai_screenHeight.value);
        }
        if (ai_form.addEventListener) {
            ai_form.addEventListener("submit", AccessIN_submit, false);
        }
        else {
            ai_form.attachEvent("onsubmit", AccessIN_submit);
        }
    }
}

if (window.addEventListener) {
    window.document.getElementById("DACAAS").addEventListener("click", AccessIN_func, false);
}
else {
    window.document.getElementById("DACAAS").attachEvent("onclick", AccessIN_func);
}
//]]>
